Perform endotracheal suctioning.sentence: The nurse prepares the suction equipment and gathers necessary supplies.
Perform endotracheal suctioning.subject: The nurse
Perform endotracheal suctioning.object: the suction equipment and necessary supplies
Perform endotracheal suctioning.tools: suction catheter, suction machine, sterile gloves, saline solution

Perform endotracheal suctioning.sentence: The nurse positions the patient appropriately to ensure optimal access to the airway.
Perform endotracheal suctioning.subject: The nurse

Perform endotracheal suctioning.sentence: The nurse dons sterile gloves and connects the suction catheter to the suction machine.
Perform endotracheal suctioning.subject: The nurse
Perform endotracheal suctioning.object: sterile gloves and connects the suction catheter

Perform endotracheal suctioning.sentence: The nurse gently inserts the suction catheter into the patient's trachea while monitoring vital signs.
Perform endotracheal suctioning.subject: The nurse
Perform endotracheal suctioning.object: the suction catheter into the patient's trachea

Perform endotracheal suctioning.sentence: The nurse applies suction briefly and removes the catheter, then assesses the patient for airway clearance.
Perform endotracheal suctioning.subject: The nurse
Perform endotracheal suctioning.object: suction briefly and removes the catheter
